summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2501 for the improvement of Ninth Avenue West, from West Halliday Street to West Barrett Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, together with all necessary adjustment of the existing sewers and water systems with their appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 27508, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
